page.title: 12Housing
page.content: Seamer has 2 main residential estates with a small commercial area on both sides of the main street.This forms the oldest part of the village with old terraced cottages built of local sandstone.the oldest of these cottages is 500-600 years old.The church was built in the 12th century.Along the main street there are 2 hotels,2 garages,2 small shops and a public house.Seamer was a linear type of village.In contrast to the old Main Street,In the last 50yrs Seamer has expanded with modern housing estates.The first of these developments began 50yrs ago at Pasture Lane.Most of these are council houses & a block of 16 houses has been added to the Stoney Haggs Road.The other main estate is on Becon Road and Napier Cres where the houses are 20-25 yrs old
